basic.description: This course is designed to acquaint doctoral students with some aspects of the teaching and research responsibilities of a sociologist and faculty member. It has both theoretical and practical components, and will cover course planning, presentation and preparation as well as planning, organizing, funding and publishing research. Grading is on a Pass/Fail basis. Course is compulsory for doctoral students and is offered every other year.   Three term-hours.  Offered in 2010-2011.
basic.subject: SOCY
basic.title: Professional/Pedagogical Skill
